ggit.exceptions module

ConfigException

class ggit.exceptions.ConfigException(message)

Bases: Exception

Custom exception raised when there are problems related to the configuration settings of the database.

ProcessException

class ggit.exceptions.ProcessException(message)

Bases: Exception

Custom exception raised when there are problems related to execution of a process.

RepositoryException

class ggit.exceptions.RepositoryException(message)

Bases: Exception

Custom exception raised when there are problems related to the repository.
